EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Pamela,
Thank you for the update. Please let me know if you have any questions in the meantime and when you are ready to move forward just reach out to me and we can begin to engage your client at that point.
Have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com

From: Pamela Wittman [mailto:witpa@hotmail.com] Sent: Wednesday, February 08, 2012 11:05 AM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: RE: MBO Partners Follow Up
Job got pushed back to start date of April 1st. As soon as I have a firm date I will give you a call.
thanks, pamela
From: ntaylor@mbopartners.com To: witpa@hotmail.com Date: Wed, 8 Feb 2012 10:34:20 -0500 Subject: MBO Partners Follow Up
Dear Pamela,
I wanted to follow up with you from our conversation regarding MBO Partners. I know you had expressed interest in using our services. Any update would be great and I look forward to hearing from you.
Regards,
Nicolette
Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
